mapper.select: SELECT send_user, revice_user, created_date, content, is_read FROM member_note
SELECT N.num, N.send_user, N.created_date, N.content, N.is_read, M.nickname AS send_user_name FROM member_note N, member M WHERE revice_user = #{num} AND N.send_user = M.num
mapper.insert: INSERT member_note(send_user, revice_user, created_date, content, is_read) VALUES(#{send_user}, #{revice_user}, SYSDATE(), #{content}, 'F');
